title: Gold II (Demoted Gold I) LFT or just other players
body: I'm a player who really would rather just play with a team of nice people than a bunch of trash talking pros. I have above average mechanics and map awareness and usually play (and win) top. Favorite champs are Shen and Pantheon, but my warding and awareness of immediate area need some work.

replies.body:
IGN: Wolves 
Can play anything but mid is least favourite
Ey mate if you're looking to make a team I'd jungle for you as I'm looking for the same, seems rare to find a team that stays together long enough to learn eachother
I'd be happy to form a team, but we need 3 other players for that! XD

U got an ADC hit me up Frost 09 have been busy for past few weeks but I'm looking at doing a weekend marathon to high gold this weekend just so people don't think I'm bad but can't be bothered with solo queue these days
well get for mid jungle and top, only bot lane to fill i gues.
I can mid for you C:
